name: Books
description: Explore our collection of educational and entertaining books for children of all ages. From picture books to chapter books, find the perfect story for your little reader.

name: Hot Wheels
description: Rev up the excitement with our Hot Wheels collection! Featuring fast cars, thrilling tracks, and endless racing adventures for speed enthusiasts.

name: Lego
description: Build, create, and imagine with our extensive Lego collection. From classic sets to themed builds, unleash creativity brick by brick.

name: Puzzles
description: Challenge young minds with our diverse puzzle collection. Enhance problem-solving skills while having fun with puzzles for every age and skill level.
